General.Name: NUUO Inc.
General.Description: NUUO Inc. provides surveillance solutions for recording, monitoring, and third-party solution integration for IP and analog cameras in Taiwan. Its NUUO Crystal Family solutions, such as NUUO NuStation, a Linux enterprise solution; NUUO Titan Pro, a Linux-based VMS solution; NUUO Network Storage solution for surveillance applications; and NUUO Crystal, a VMS solution. The company's NUUO Mainconsole Family solutions, which include NUUO central management system to manage large scale installations and alarms; NUUO Mainconsole, a NUUO PC based video recording server; NUUO Hybrid Appliance solution to choose a pure DVR, pure NVR, and a hybrid system; NUUO NVRmini 2 and NUUO NVRmini 3 portable NVR solutions; NUUO IP Appliance solution that provides integration between older and newer types of cameras; NUUO Report Service, which visualizes the people counting data into various graphic types; NUUO NVRSolo_Plus, a Linux embedded standalone solution; and NUUO intelligent video surveillance solution, a video analytics solution. It also offers NUUO Point of Sale (POS) solution that connects surveillance video with transaction data from POS and ATM; NUUO Facial recognition solution that connects surveillance videos with NUUO Nuface software; NUUO license plate recognition (LPR) solution, which connects surveillance videos with third party LPR solutions; and NUUO Access Control solution that connects surveillance video with access control systems from 3rd party partners. In addition, the company offers NUUO iViewer solution to remotely monitor live video from security cameras; NUUO Temperature Monitoring Panel; NUUO thermal detection solution; IP cameras; VZIII, a retail analytics system; and accessories. It serves retail, transportation, industrial, educational, banking, hospitality, and residential, as well as government. NUUO Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.
